thread.title: Scott Evans Harker
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Scott Evans Harker

author: Scott Evans Harker
title: Scott Evans Harker
text: A competitor of yours wasted three (3) months of my life "trying" to get me the same Savile Row product I purchased from Frames Direct, before telling me they were cancelling my order due to supplier "problems". With Frames Direct, it was in my hands within 4 weeks of placing my order. Given these frames were hand-made in England, requiring 4 to 6 weeks, each, I was, and remain, impressed! Always pleasant to transact business with an professional, on-line, organization like Frames Direct.
